name: Put my gun down!
description:
Put my gun down!
A quick mini adventure game about ending a life of a naked time traveling man.
Help me improve this game by commenting or rating.

How to play

  • Use WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Bump into ! and ? to read stuff
  • Please do not click/tap on the screen to move

This game is a part of september 2017 bitsy jam with a theme 'A Secret'
https://itch.io/jam/a-secret
